file_content.text: Morale's at a new high, and the men are eager to settle the score.
You called in quite a few strikes. Good news to report?
Those cannons won't trouble you again. The Mandalorian troops supporting your warlord are another story.
I found hostile Mandalorians.
Blast it. Too many Mandalorian clans to keep track of... never did like them.
Your toys did a fine job.
Time to show your gratitude.
Of course, you've more than earned it.
Count on us to finish the rest.
Without their guns to hide behind, those craven scum will crumble before us.
We can handle the enemy once those cannons are offline.
We're looking for an update on the situation out here, Commander.
What's the situation, Commander?
My lord.
Not good, I'm afraid. Could use someone like you right now.
One of the local warlords appears to have taken offense at Imperial troops moving through his territory.
He's been turning his cannons on our men.
Why haven't you crushed him?
He must pay.
Storming the warlord's base with those cannons in place is just not worth the losses.
Perhaps I should have a word with your unfriendly neighbor.
Terribly rude of him.
I'd love to see that, my lord, but I'm sure the insect isn't worth your notice. It's his cannons that are the concern.
I could bring him in, let you two sort it out.
I smell a bounty.
Regime changes happen to be a specialty of mine.
Elimination is an option.
I wouldn't waste your talents on that scum. Without those cannons there, we could raze his fortress to the ground in a day.
How bad is it?
It was a painful revelation, but we've been more cautious with our movements. It's stymied our advance, however.
He'll regret that.
I'd advise caution. There's something off about this whole situation.
The squad of mercenaries I sent to destroy the emplacements have failed to report back. Leaves me in a bind.
I need someone to get in range of those cannons and mark them for bombardment.
I'll do it.
What do I get out of it?
None of you will go unappreciated once those cannons fall silent, but I can't spare any resources before then.
I'm not certain what I can pull together, but your intervention will be rewarded.
Intelligence not filling your accounts? I'll make sure this collaboration is well-funded.
Not happening, bounty hunter. I'll gladly pay to see those cannons removed, but I'm not parting with credits on promises.
I'll make sure you're appropriately compensated.
Take this target designator. It'll allow you to call in pinpoint strikes on the cannons' positions.
Give them a taste of Imperial firepower.
I'll pass. [Refuse quest]
They've only fired on large groups and convoys so far. Probably saving their ammo to repel a full assault.
If you change your mind about those cannons, I'd be appreciative.
Blasted Mandalorians. Can't be bothered to report to an Imperial command. Pah.
